c74object.name: abc.mc.chopan~
c74object.description: abc.mc.chopan~ provides multisource stereo panning using a generalization of Chowning's algorithm.

attribute.name: n
attribute.digest: sets the number of input sources to be panned

method.name: phi0
method.description: sets the opening angle of the stereo in degrees [init=30, min=1, max=90, step=1].
method.digest: sets the opening angle of the stereo in degrees

method.name: gain
method.description: sets the general volume in dB [init=0, min=-127, max=18, step=0.01].

method.name: incAngle
method.description: sets the incident angle of the source in degrees when there is only one (for chopan1) [init=0, min=-90, max=90, step=1].
method.digest: sets the incident angle of the source in degrees when there is only one (for chopan1)
